    • sendPacket

      public void sendPacket​(Packet<?> packet)
      Description copied from interface: NetworkManager
      Sends a packet to the other connection participant. If the current thread is not in EventExecutor.inEventLoop(), the packet is sent through Executor.execute(Runnable), it is sent directly if NetworkManager.channelOpen() returns true.
      Specified by:
      sendPacket in interface NetworkManager
      Parameters:
      packet - The packet that should be sent to the other connection participant.
